StructMessageHandler< OBJECT_TYPE, ARGS_TYPE, FIND_POLICY > Class Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<class OBJECT_TYPE, class ARGS_TYPE, class FIND_POLICY = MessageHandlerFinder< OBJECT_TYPE >>
class StructMessageHandler< OBJECT_TYPE, ARGS_TYPE, FIND_POLICY >

Objects of this type are used to handle messages destined for the cellapp, a space or a cell.
